attributes.action: Set the minimum time in office to 12 months to be eligible to claim the PDCA
attributes.additional_details: Change the rules by adding a minimum term in office before being eligible to prevent the fund being exploited.
attributes.background:
Liz Truss's incompetence and recklessness has added unnecessary costs to millions around the UK at a time when people are already struggling.

She should not be eligible to claim the PDCA.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/626194
